      • setUseTwitchCapabilities

        public void setUseTwitchCapabilities(boolean useTwitchCapabilities)
        Enable or disable twitch capabilities, this must be set before the bot is started for it to take effect
        Parameters:
        useTwitchCapabilities - if set to true capabilities will be enabled once the bot has connected
        See Also:
        Twitch IRC Documentation

      • isUsingTwitchCapabilities
